Pre-Game Insights: Portland Trail Blazers vs. Memphis Grizzlies conference matchup
Portland finished 21-61 overall and 8-44 in Western Conference play last season
Memphis finished 27-55 overall and 14-37 in Western Conference action
Trail Blazers averaged 106.4 points per game while shooting 43.9% from the field and 34.5% from 3-point distance last season
Grizzlies averaged 105.8 points per game last season, 16.0 on free throws and 39.3 from deep
